name: Jane Hunter
content: Information about Jane Hunter The University of Queensland HomeJane Professor Jane Hunter Professorial Research Fellow Director of the eResearch Lab School of ITEE Level 7, GP South, Staff House Rd, The University of Queensland QLD, 4072, AUSTRALIA j.hunter@uq.edu.au Overview Publications Grants Students Projects Overview Research Interests eScience/eResearch Semantic Web, Linked Data Ontology-based Data Integration Data Analytics, Machine Learning Open Access to Scientific Data Digital Data Curation and Preservation Qualifications PhD (Computer Science) (Cambridge) B. Engineering (UQ) (1A Hons) B.Science (UQ) Service Roles Deputy Chair of the Academy of Sciences National Committee for Data in Science (NCDIS), 2018 Chair of the Academy of Sciences National Committee for Data in Science (NCDIS), 2014-2017 Member of the Executive Committee of ICSU CODATA (International Committee on Data for Science and Technology", 2016-2018 Director of Higher Degree Research (HDR) Studies, The School of ITEE, 2016-2017 Member of Scientific Committee of the ICSU World Data System (WDS) (2012-2014) ARC ERA Research Evaluation Committee (Maths, Information & Computer Sciences) (2010, 2012, 2015) Editorial Board Member of: Elsevier Journal of Web Semantics Elsevier SoftwareX Journal International Journal of Digital Curation IEEE Multimedia Vice-President of the National Executive Committee for Digital Humanities (2011-2014) On This Site Grants Projects Publications Students The University of Queensland, Australia Brisbane St Lucia, QLD 4072 +61 7 3365 1111 Other Campuses: UQ Ipswich, UQ Gatton, UQ Herston Maps and Directions Â© 2013 The University of Queensland A Member of Terms of use | Feedback ABN: 63 942 912 684 CRICOS Provider No: 00025B Quick Links For Media Emergency Contact Social Media Facebook Twitter iTunes U YouTube Channel Explore Giving to UQ Faculties & Divisions UQ Jobs Contact UQ Services & Facilities
